name: Mutazione EVA
description:
Mitochondrial Head

A 3D model of a head encoding the Mitochondrial DNA, successively glitched through data bending and then rendered to triangle outlines.

This artwork was produced as part of the Eva project - read the full story and see the complete artwork at https://hex6c.medium.com/eva-a-mitochondrial-story-eec51f8c803a.

DNA encoding of the 3D model by Dobleganger, glitch by Altered Data aka Dom Barra.
